definitions: Makes a long, thin, shallow mark or cut on a surface or skin with a sharp object or nail.
Rubs a part of one's body with one's nails or claws to relieve itching.
Withdraws from a competition or race.
Manages to get by or achieve something with difficulty.
examples: He scratches his head when he's confused.
The horse scratches from the race.
She scratches out a living as an artist.
